title: Software Design Competency Enhancement Program Through Problem-Based Robotics Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practitioner-focused design for working professionals, including language domain application case studies.

learning_goals: Students can develop programs applying object-oriented design principles to solve real-world robot control problems.
Students can systematically perform requirement analysis, design, and testing phases in open-ended problem situations.
Students can complete software design documentation and presentation materials through team-based collaboration.

resources: Simulation Robot Software (ROS), Version Control System (Git), Collaboration Tools (Notion/Miro)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
